$eref.description: Object model for the Azure CLI script.

___properties.description: Properties of the Azure CLI script object.

___location.description: The location of the ACI and the storage account for the deployment script.

$eref.description: Managed identity generic object.

___userAssignedIdentities.description: The list of user-assigned managed identities associated with the resource. Key is the Azure resource Id of the managed identity.

Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

_88AzurePowerShellScriptProperties.description: Properties of the Azure PowerShell script object.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___supportingScriptUris.description: Supporting files for the external script.

___timeout.description: Maximum allowed script execution time specified in ISO 8601 format. Default value is PT1H

___retentionInterval.description: Interval for which the service retains the script resource after it reaches a terminal state. Resource will be deleted when this duration expires. Duration is based on ISO 8601 pattern (for example P7D means one week).

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___cleanupPreference.description: The clean up preference when the script execution gets in a terminal state. Default setting is 'Always'.

___forceUpdateTag.description: Gets or sets how the deployment script should be forced to execute even if the script resource has not changed. Can be current time stamp or a GUID.

___primaryScriptUri.description: Uri for the script. This is the entry point for the external script.

___azPowerShellVersion.description: Azure PowerShell module version to be used.

$eref.description: The environment variable to pass to the script in the container instance.

___name.description: The name of the environment variable.

___secureValue.description: The value of the secure environment variable.

___value.description: The value of the environment variable.

$eref.description: Deployment template expression. See https://aka.ms/arm-template-expressions for more details on the ARM expression syntax.

___environmentVariables.description: The environment variables to pass over to the script.

___arguments.description: Command line arguments to pass to the script. Arguments are separated by spaces. ex: -Name blue* -Location 'West US 2'

___principalId.description: Azure Active Directory principal ID associated with this identity.

___clientId.description: Client App Id associated with this identity.
